author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Better to have, and not need, than to need, and not have.

author: Karveen Mohammad
text:
But what if all the tranquility, all the comfort, all the contentment were now to come to a horrifying end?

― Franz Kafka

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Why do humans try to hold onto things?! at the same time, when there is willpower to let go, it becomes easy to cope afterward!!

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: You don't feel loved until you trust that the love being expressed toward you comes without any special conditions or baggage attached to it.

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: There is a fountain inside you, don't walk around with an empty bucket.

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Moments are born and moments die. For new experiences to come to light, old ones need to wither away. Don't you think?

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Each time I say good-bye to a place I like, I feel like I am leaving a part of me behind!!

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Live life as if everything is rigged in your favor.

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: I am not this hair, I am not this skin, I am the soul that lives within.

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: ''The path to the Truth is a labor of the heart, not of the head. Make your heart your primary guide! Not your mind. Meet, challenge, and ultimately prevail over your nafs with your heart. Knowing yourself will lead you to the knowledge of God''

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: '' How we see God is a direct reflection of how we see ourselves. If God brings to mind mostly fear and blame, it means there is too much fear and blame welled inside us. If we see God as full of love and compassion, so are we.''

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: 'You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore'

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: 'Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life'

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Wisdom does not come from knowledge, it comes from love.

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Same here! https://t.co/86EcnLVEKx

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Once your awareness becomes a flame, it burns up the whole slavery that the mind has created!

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Things change everyday. With each new dawn, it is not the same world as before. And you are not the same person you were either.

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: "In everybody's life there is a point of no return. And in a very few cases, a point where you can't go forward anymore. And when we reach that point, all we can do is quietly accept the fact, that's how we survive"

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: "The heart knows a thousand ways to speak"

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: "The time and effort taken to discover your own being, should be the most enjoyable period of existence you could ever had"

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: “Love never becomes wise, and that is its wisdom” #Osho

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: Thoughts are shadows, don’t fight with them”

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: “Wherever you are and whatever you do, be in love”

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: “Seek the spirit; do not set your heart on bones” #Rumi

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: “Drop reactions, and allow more and more responses”

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: “Reason is powerless in the expression of Love...”

author: Karveen Mohammad
text: "Be a giver share whatsoever you can"
